channel.title: Need help with adding edge to ZDR
channel.description: Hey guys i've seen alot of people do this and I want to do it so bad because the same PKing place on ZDR is boring as hell, and I don't get how to change it, and tons of people have done it like Summon-pkz server Omegascape and like tons more, could someone like post the coords or somethin to add it? Thanks
